author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-HomeStreet Comments On ISS Report, Urges Shareholders To Vote On White Card For Co's Nominees
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - HomeStreet Inc:
* HOMESTREET COMMENTS ON ISS REPORT AND URGES SHAREHOLDERS TO VOTE ON THE WHITE CARD FOR ALL THE COMPANY’S NOMINEES
* HOMESTREET INC - “ISS REACHED THE WRONG CONCLUSION IN RECOMMENDING THAT SHAREHOLDERS NOT VOTE FOR SCOTT BOGGS” Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
